instructions: Open the Settings app on one device, tap your name to open the Apple ID screen, then select iCloud . Turn on the toggle switches next to every category of app and content that you want to sync between the iPhone and iPad. Repeat this process with the second device. The settings must be set identically on both devices for the sync to work. Go to Settings > Passwords & Accounts and ensure the email accounts are set up the same on both devices. Go to Settings > iTunes & App Store and turn on automatic downloads for Music , Apps , Books & Audiobooks , and Updates on both devices by moving the toggle switches next to them to the On /green position.
